data.text: @EmilyRoseElPaso @SherisBrothel Sending you lots of positive vibes and good, healing thoughts. You'll be missed at the ranch. Pls get well soon!!🌸🌺🌿🌷❇️🌻🌹🌱💮🍲
@EmilyRoseElPaso @SherisBrothel We hope you feel better soon!!! 🙏

@EmilyRoseElPaso @SherisBrothel Recovery can be rough. Something many still don't understand. I know a couple people still dealing with it. Good luck and hope you don't deal with it for too much longer.
@EmilyRoseElPaso @SherisBrothel Hope you get to feeling better soon!
